title: Starter Pack
description: 5 essential cottage cheese recipes to get you started. From fluffy pancakes to creamy protein pudding, these are the best beginner-friendly recipes!

title: Pancake Lovers Pack
description: Every cottage cheese pancake and waffle recipe in one pack. 8 delicious variations for the ultimate breakfast rotation!

title: Breakfast Pack
description: Start every morning with high-protein cottage cheese breakfasts. Eggs, bowls, French toast, and more!

title: Dessert Pack
description: Satisfy your sweet tooth with high-protein cottage cheese desserts. Brownies, cookies, cheesecake, and pudding!

title: Savory Pack
description: Cottage cheese goes beyond breakfast with flatbreads, pizza, garlic knots, and more savory creations!
